PlayNewChatterSound.label: Play New Chatter Sound
PlayNewChatterSound.tooltip: Whether or not to play a sound when a new chatter joins the stream.

NewChatterSoundLocation.label: New Chatter Sound Location
NewChatterSoundLocation.tooltip: The file location of the sound to play when a new chatter joins the stream.

TestSound.label: Test Sound (Save First)
TestSound.tooltip:
Test sound & volume!
Must save settings first!

SendNewChatterMessage.label: Reply to New Chatter
SendNewChatterMessage.tooltip: Use the message above to send a message to the new chatter.

NewChatterMessage.label: Message
NewChatterMessage.tooltip:
Message to send, if left blank this message will not be sent! 
{0} = Username

BtnResetUserFile.label: Reset User File
BtnResetUserFile.tooltip:
Resets the list of users who have chatted in this stream. 
User file is reset every time the chatbot is opened.

BtnDefaults.label: Restore Default Settings
BtnDefaults.tooltip:
Reset settings back to defaults.
Reload Scripts afterwards to see the changes in the user interface!
